apiResources.description: This API is **protected** via BasicAuth and is tenant aware

accessStrategies.customDescription:
The metadata information is openly accessible but system instance aware.
The tenant is selected by providing a SAP global tenant ID header.
To understand how to use this access strategy, please read the documentation on the [ORD Reference App Access Strategies](https://github.com/SAP-samples/open-resource-discovery-reference-application#access-strategies).

The metadata information is openly accessible but system instance aware.
The tenant is selected by providing a local tenant ID header.
To understand how to use this access strategy, please read the documentation on the [ORD Reference App Access Strategies](https://github.com/SAP-samples/open-resource-discovery-reference-application#access-strategies).

extensible.description: This API can be extended with custom fields.

consumptionBundles.title: Unprotected resources
consumptionBundles.description: This Consumption Bundle contains all resources of the reference app which are unprotected and do not require authentication

consumptionBundles.title: BasicAuth protected resources
consumptionBundles.description: This Consumption Bundle contains all resources of the reference app which share the same BasicAuth access and identity realm

credentialExchangeStrategies.customDescription:
The BasicAuth credentials must be created and retrieved manually.
 Please refer to the documentation on the [ORD Reference App API access](https://github.com/SAP-samples/open-resource-discovery-reference-application#access-strategies).
